app.title: Roos van Sharon
app.description: Handmade felt flowers for special moments in your life.
app.heroText: Welcome to Roos van Sharon. I'm Francis!

hero.title: Why flowers made of felt?
hero.description: Welcome to this website, how nice that you are interested! Due to all the reports in the media about abuses in the flower industry and the consequences for the environment and health, I started thinking about alternatives. That is the reason I started making felt flowers. Flowers are indispensable for happy but also sad events in a person's life. To prevent misery from being attached to the flowers I make, I work exclusively with felt that is made under good working conditions and obtained in an animal-friendly way. For me, it is important to treat the world and people near and far well, so I think it is very nice to donate 10% of your purchase amount to Doctors Without Borders. This way, more people can benefit from your purchase.

home.title: Roos van Sharon - Handmade Felt Flowers | Mourning Pieces & Bridal Bouquets
home.description: Unique handmade felt flowers for mourning pieces and bridal bouquets. Lasting memories of special moments. Personal attention and careful craftsmanship.
home.keywords: felt flowers, mourning pieces, bridal bouquets, handmade, memorial flowers, wedding flowers, memorial, remembrance pieces, Francis van Wieringen

about.title: About Roos van Sharon - Francis van Wieringen | Handmade Felt Flowers
about.description: Learn more about Francis van Wieringen and the meaning behind Roos van Sharon. Involvement and creativity in making unique felt flowers for special moments.
about.keywords: Francis van Wieringen, about us, rose of sharon meaning, handmade flowers, felt artist

contact.title: Contact - Roos van Sharon | Get in Touch For Questions
contact.description: Do you have questions about the felt flowers, mourning pieces or bridal bouquets? Feel free to contact us. Personal advice and a listening ear for your wishes.
contact.keywords: contact, questions, personal advice, custom made, make appointment

common.imageAlt: Roos van Sharon - Handmade Felt Flowers
common.heroImageAlt: Handmade felt flowers for memorial pieces and wedding bouquets - Roos van Sharon

mourning.mournPiecesDesc1: One of the saddest things that can happen to you is losing a loved one. Someone who had an important place in your life. Creating an emptiness when that person is no longer there. An emptiness that cannot be filled by anyone because every person is unique and irreplaceable.
mourning.mournPiecesDesc2: It can be comforting to have a place in your home where you can commemorate and remember. With this thought in mind, I created these mourning pieces and memorial altars. The mourning pieces can, for example, be placed on the casket during the memorial service or next to a photo. Afterwards, you have a memory at home of what was a dignified and loving farewell for you.
mourning.mournPiecesDesc3: The reason I chose to make not only bridal bouquets but also mourning flowers is that it is very special for me to be able to contribute a small part in this process. To be able to mean something, however small. That's why ordering mourning flowers from me is not a purely business matter. I find it extremely important to listen to your story, your memories, and your wishes with attention and care.
mourning.mournPiecesDesc4: I can also make the memorial altars on commission if you would like. To know exactly what your wishes are, I find it important to have contact (by phone) beforehand. Perhaps your loved one was fond of certain types of flowers. I can then incorporate those into the altar piece. I also find it important to have a picture of your loved one. So that I can work on your memorial altar with that image in mind. For me, it is important to work with care and love.
mourning.mournPiecesDesc5: Because flowers for funerals are often needed within a short time, it is often not possible to make them on commission. Making mourning pieces deserves time and attention that is not always available in the short term. That's why I have created a collection of mourning pieces that can be shipped within a few days.

wedding.weddingDesc1: On the most beautiful day of your life, you naturally deserve the most beautiful flowers! And how wonderful is it when those flowers don't wilt. You don't have to worry about them during the wedding. And afterwards, you have a beautiful memory of this special day. That day in your life when you wholeheartedly said yes to your beloved.
wedding.weddingDesc2: Of course, you want everything to be carefully coordinated. The bridal attire and the flowers. You can, for example, choose to wear small felt flowers in your hair. I can also make corsages to go with it. Everything naturally matching your bridal bouquet.
wedding.weddingDesc3: Because making a bridal bouquet, corsages, etc. takes quite a bit of time, it is advisable to contact me at least 6 months in advance. This way I can take the time to make the bouquet of your wishes. For a small bouquet without corsages, you can contact me four months in advance.
wedding.weddingDesc4: Because choosing your bridal bouquet is naturally part of the anticipation, I would like to invite you to come by so we can talk extensively about your specific wishes while enjoying a cup of coffee and something delicious.
wedding.weddingDesc5: When I have about half of the bouquet ready, it's nice to meet again. We can then see if you want to change anything or if you are completely satisfied. Because the flowers always stay beautiful, you can have them at home well in advance. This saves you hassle on the day itself.
wedding.weddingDesc6: Are you interested? Feel free to make an appointment. I'd love to hear from you!

about.heroDesc1: I chose the name Roos van Sharon because it encompasses everything; mourning, love and joy.
about.heroDesc2: It symbolizes beauty, love, but also healing of the soul.
about.heroDesc3: And that is exactly what I want to express with the flowers.
about.aboutMeDesc1: My name is Francis van Wieringen
about.aboutMeDesc2: For many years I have worked in healthcare as an activities coordinator. In my work, I have always found it important to seek connection with the residents. I combined this with creative activities.
about.aboutMeDesc3: Involvement and creativity: that is what I also want to combine now in making these felt flowers. Flowers for significant happy or sad events in people's lives. In the hope of being able to mean something to you in this way.
about.closingDesc1: Take your time, feel free to look around this website.
about.closingDesc2: And don't hesitate to contact me if there is anything you would like to ask or discuss. I'd love to hear from you!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Roos van Sharon, we respect your privacy. This page explains what data we collect and how we use it.
privacy.dataCollectionDesc: When you place an order or create an account, we collect:
privacy.dataCollectionList1: Your name, email address and phone number
privacy.dataCollectionList2: Delivery address (street, house number, postal code, city)
privacy.dataCollectionList4: Account details (username, password) if you create an account
privacy.dataUsageTitle: How Do We Use Your Data?
privacy.dataUsageList4: Keep you informed about the status of your order
privacy.dataSecurityTitle: How Do We Protect Your Data?
privacy.dataSecurityList2: Personal data such as name, address and contact information are stored encrypted
privacy.dataSecurityList3: Access to data is secured and restricted
privacy.dataSecurityList4: We do not share your data with third parties, except when necessary for delivery
privacy.dataRetentionTitle: How Long Do We Keep Your Data?
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We only keep your data for as long as necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. Order data is kept for administrative purposes. You can always request us to delete your data.
privacy.yourRightsList1: Request access to your personal data
privacy.yourRightsList4: Object to the processing of your data
privacy.contactDesc: For questions about privacy or your data, you can contact us through the contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms apply to the use of our website and ordering products.
terms.aboutDesc: Roos van Sharon creates handmade felt flowers for special moments. Each product is made with care and attention.
terms.orderingList1: You will receive an order confirmation by email
terms.orderingList2: Bridal bouquets require at least 4-6 months preparation time
terms.orderingList3: Mourning pieces from the ready-made collection can be shipped within a few days
terms.orderingList4: We reserve the right to refuse orders if necessary
terms.customWorkDesc: For bridal bouquets and special commissions, we prefer to contact you personally. We will discuss your wishes and make arrangements about the design and planning.
terms.paymentDesc: Payment is made via a secure payment link that you will receive after placing your order. Your order will be processed after receipt of payment.
terms.deliveryDesc: Delivery times vary per product. For standard products we aim for delivery within a few days. Separate arrangements apply for custom work.
terms.accountsDesc: You can optionally create an account to:
terms.accountsList3: Secure your account with a password
terms.accountsList4: We will send a verification email to confirm your email address
terms.responsibilityList1: Provide correct contact details and delivery address
terms.responsibilityList2: Use the platform in an honest manner
terms.responsibilityList3: Keep your account details safe (if applicable)
terms.changesDesc: We reserve the right to change these terms. Changes will be published on this page.
terms.contactDesc: For questions about these terms, you can contact us through the contact page.
